title: Following regulations shall be applicable for the lands included in congested area (or core area) as shown on the Development Plan
clause_text: Following regulations shall be applicable for the lands included in congested area (or core area) as shown on the Development Plan. These regulations shall also be applicable for the gaothan areas in Regional Plans (including the areas of Local Bodies and Special Planning Authorities where Development Plan or Planning Proposal is not sanctioned).

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
